source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SEQ_00<tab>The dig site chief eyes you expectantly.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SEQ_00<tab>Le porion est prêt à vous mettre au travail.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SEQ_01<tab>Eager to begin the task of rebuilding Komra, the dig site chief wishes to have a discussion with you and the one whole other person who volunteered to help. At the man's behest, you set out to find the third member of your little crew, a certain dwarf with a cheerfully pessimistic outlook on existence.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SEQ_01<tab>L'heure est venue pour le porion et vous d'entamer la recon<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion de Komra. Pour commencer, il vous a demandé d'aller parler à votre premier bénévole, le villageois désespéré. Vous le trouverez dans le village.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SEQ_02<tab>The rebuilding effort requires much in the way of supplies and many willing hands, both of which are notably lacking in Komra at present. To overcome this problem, the dig site chief has come up with the idea of availing yourselves of the technology used by the machines. For your part in this plan, you are required to venture into the tunnels to gather items that may be of use, and bring them back to your dwarven associate for inspection. Thus begins the great endeavor to rebuild Komra and prove to one and all that naught can keep dwarves down─save perhaps copious amounts of grog.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez rejoint le villageois désespéré, puis le porion est venu vous expliquer plus en détail le défi qui vous attend tous les trois. Son idée est de pallier votre manque criant de main-d'œuvre et de matières premières en exploitant la technologie des formes de vie mécaniques. Votre mission serait donc de vous aventurer dans leur fief pour en rapporter débris et autres carcasses de machines. Retroussez-vous les manches, et faites de cette initiative un pari gagnant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_001<tab>Lali-thanks again for offering to help us rebuild our village-ho. So, are you rested and ready to begin the work?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_001<tab>C'est vraiment sympa de ta part de bien vouloir m'aider à reconstruire notre village. Si t'es <var 08 E905 ((prête)) ((prêt)) /var>, je te propose d'entrer tout de suite dans le vif du sujet.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_A1_000_002<tab>Not just yet. I still have worlds to save and packages to deliver.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_A1_000_002<tab>J'ai mieux à faire pour le moment, <var 08 E905 ((désolée)) ((désolé)) /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_003<tab>Wonderful. I can't tell you how reassuring it is to have you with us.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_003<tab>Quel aplomb<var 1D /var>! Rien que de t'entendre, ça me fait tout chaud dans mon p'tit cœur.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_004<tab>Now, to begin with, we need to discuss how we're going to tackle our task.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_004<tab>Pour commencer, est-ce que tu pourrais aller chercher le brave gars qui s'est proposé de nous aider<var 1D /var>? C'est celui qui est un peu froussard, là. Je voudrais qu'on soit tous réunis pour vous exposer mon plan d'action.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_104<tab>If you could join our nervous friend over there, I'll be along after I see to some preparation.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_104<tab>Reste avec lui, je règle deux, trois trucs et je vous rejoins. À tout à l'heure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_005<tab>Well, far be it from me to rush you. When you're done saving all the worlds and delivering all the packages, we'll be waiting for you right here.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_005<tab>Arf, dommage. Repasse me voir quand t'auras du temps libre alors.

source:
TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_VILLAGERD03954_000_050<tab>Uwaaah! It's come! My doom is come! Doooooom!
...Oh, it's just you. Sorry, force of habit. So, uh...is it time? To rebuild, that is.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_VILLAGERD03954_000_050<tab>Hiiiiiiiih<var 1D /var>! D-désolé, ça me fait toujours sursauter quand on m'adresse la parole sans prévenir. J-j'espère qu'on va bien s'entendre malgré tout...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_051<tab>Everyone's here. Good. Let's get right to it. I have an idea that I want to run by the two of you.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_051<tab>Bien, à nous trois. Laissez-moi vous expliquer comment j'envisage con<var 16 /var>crè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment la recon<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion du village.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_052<tab>In order to rebuild, we're going to need lots of supplies and willing hands, neither of which we have a whole heap of at the moment.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_052<tab>Pour commencer, il va évidemment nous falloir de la main-d'œuvre et du matériel, deux ressources qui pour l'heure nous font cruellement défaut.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_053<tab>But then I thought: what if we availed ourselves of the technology used by the machines? With the wealth of parts they left behind, we have all the materials we need to rebuild <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> upgrade our automata to do the work.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_053<tab>Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, il nous reste un atout inexploité<var 1D /var>: la technologie de nos assaillants. À mes yeux, c'est notre meilleure chance de pallier notre manque de moyens.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_054<tab>Not only would it be practical─since we'd be using the force behind our destruction for our salvation, it's also poetic!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_054<tab>On pourrait par exemple récupérer leurs pièces détachées pour améliorer nos automates, ou les fondre et utiliser le métal pour rebâtir nos maisons.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_055<tab>For your part in this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'd ask you to venture into the tunnels and gather those items what might be useful.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_055<tab>Toi qui connais bien la base ennemie, je te chargerais de nous rapporter des carcasses et autres débris recyclables.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_056<tab>Whatever you find, you can bring to our friend here. He'll examine the objects to see how they might be put to use.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_056<tab>Nous deux, on passerait tout ça au crible, et on essayerait de mettre à profit nos découvertes pour accélérer le chantier.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_058<tab>And that's about it. So, what do you think?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_058<tab>Alors, qu'est-ce que t'en penses<var 1D /var>? Ça te parle, comme plan<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_A2_000_002<tab>I, uh...wasn't paying attention. Could you explain it again?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_A2_000_002<tab>J'ai perdu le fil, vous pouvez reprendre du début<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_060<tab>Had a few ales too many, did you? After recent events, I don't blame you. Anyway, let me explain it all again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_060<tab>Groumpf... D'accord, mais ouvre grand tes cages à miel cette fois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_062<tab>Good, good. With this, the rebuilding can finally commence. We'll prove to everyone that you can't keep us dwarves down─except maybe with copious amounts of grog. That's been an issue, historically.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_062<tab>Bien. On va enfin pouvoir passer aux choses sérieuses... et prouver à ces saletés de machines qu'un Nain retombe toujours sur ses petons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_063<tab>Well, I'd best be getting back to my post. Without someone breathing down their necks, our miners are liable to stand around with their thumbs up their arses. You have any questions, you can direct them at our friend here.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_DWARFMASTER03671_000_063<tab>Par contre, je risque d'être un peu occupé comme je dois aussi veiller sur les mineurs. Commence donc par filer un coup de main à notre ami ici présent. Je te dis à plus tard.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_VILLAGERD03954_000_064<tab>Between you and me, we're probably doomed to fail. But if it's going to happen anyway, there's no point in delaying it. That's to say, if you're ready to begin, then so am I!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_VILLAGERD03954_000_064<tab>T'as entendu le porion. Alors, on s'y met<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SYSTEM_100_064<tab>A weekly quest which continues the story is now available from the doomsaying dwarf in Komra.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SYSTEM_100_064<tab>Vous pouvez à présent lancer des quêtes hebdomadaires permettant de faire avancer l'histoire en vous adressant au villageois désespéré.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SYSTEM_200_065<tab>Lend your aid and help the dwarves of Komra to rebuild their home.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA510_04043_SYSTEM_200_065<tab>Prêtez-lui main-forte, et contribuez ainsi à la recon<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion de Komra<var 1D /var>!
